General.Name: Aimfinity Investment Corp. I Subunit
General.Description: Aimfinity Investment Corp. I does not have significant operations. The company focuses on effecting a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses or entities. It intends to identify and complete its business combination with technology, hospitality, and consumer services sector. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Wilmington, Delaware. Aimfinity Investment Corp. I operates as a subsidiary of Aimfinity Investment LLC.
General.Address: 221 West 9th Street, Wilmington, DE, United States, 19801
